1.title: Episode #7.1
1.plot: Police use ingenious methods to track down a mugger who robbed and injured a railway enthusiast. A garage keeps being raided by thieves until a mechanic uses his expertise to stop them.

2.title: Episode #7.2
2.plot: A shop worker is horrified when a man armed with a knife bursts into his shop and he has seconds to make the most important decision of his life. When builders spot a man stealing their tools they rush him.

3.title: Episode #7.3
3.plot: A shop owner risks her life to save a colleague when they are confronted by an armed robber wielding an axe. Plus, a life size ornamental pig is stolen by two teenagers.

4.title: Episode #7.4
4.plot: When a jeweller is confronted by an armed robber he takes the biggest risk of his life by making a grab for the gun. A thief has a cunning plan to steal a cash machine from a garage but makes a schoolboy error.

5.title: Episode #7.5
5.plot: A prolific pickpocket is preying on women carrying bags and backpacks at railway stations - but the hunter is about to become the hunted. Thieves try to steal a parcel from the doorstep of a home.

6.title: Episode #7.6
6.plot: A woman's carer is stealing from her so her sister comes up with a plan to foil the thief. A theatre studies graduate faces real life drama when a hammer wielding robber raids the shop where she works.

7.title: Episode #7.7
7.plot: A family business is raided by a former employee wanting cash - and he has brought along some backup. When an armed man bursts into a shop terrified staff hide but a customer walks in unawares.

8.title: Episode #7.8
8.plot: A series of crimes is targeting railways in Devon. The barman at a snooker club turns detective when two strangers come in and steal money meant for a charity that means the world to him.

9.title: Episode #7.9
9.plot: A customer is thrown out of a pub for fighting but takes revenge by driving his car into a crowd of locals. Restaurant diners try to leave without paying but the owner is wise to their plan.

10.title: Episode #7.10
10.plot: Two girls watch in fear as their shop-owner father grapples with a dangerous gunman. Someone's stealing money from a frail 93-year-old, and any one of a large number of visitors could be the culprit.

11.title: Episode #7.11
11.plot: When a pub landlady suffers a heartbreaking theft of money meant for her ill daughter local people join police to catch the culprits. A cafe owner uses technology to see, hear and speak to burglars.

12.title: Episode #7.12
12.plot: A family man is caught unawares by muggers on the way home from a night out, but the thieves get a surprise of their own. A launderette owner is targeted by light-fingered locals, but one hasn't looked at who he is stealing from.

13.title: Episode #7.13
13.plot: 2 men attacking a jewellers with an axe end up looking more like a couple of clowns than a pair of dangerous criminals. Following a series of muggings of elderly ladies in Norwich, the purchase of a lottery ticket proves a vital clue.

14.title: Episode #7.14
14.plot: Con men dress as police officers to steal 1,000's of pounds from elderly victims, but their ringleader makes a crucial error. A shoplifter boogies away thinking no-one can see her but her criminal dancing is caught on camera.

15.title: Episode #7.15
15.plot: An adventure centre and a garage are both burgled but security cameras don't show the thief's face - maybe street cameras will. A partially blind man is tricked at a cash-point machine by a callous thief.

16.title: Episode #7.16
16.plot: A couple renovating a run-down house disagree over installing CCTV, but the camera proves its worth when their dream home has an unwelcome guest. A burglar robbing a pizza takeaway has his bike stolen by another thief.

17.title: Episode #7.17
17.plot: A 12-year-old girl is left fearing for her life when masked burglars try to break down the door of her home. A body-popping burglar does a victory dance but his celebration doesn't last long.

18.title: Episode #7.18
18.plot: A family suffer a terrifying ordeal when masked thieves break into their home. A 6-year-old girl managed to escape - can she raise the alarm. A bungling bike thief ends up getting a ride he doesn't want.

19.title: Episode #7.19
19.plot: A shop assistant is shocked when armed robbers burst in, but he's made of stern stuff. Police put invisible dye on cash to try and catch a carer who steals from elderly victims - will the thief be caught blue-handed?

20.title: Episode #7.20
20.plot: A burglar targets businesses including a pub and a chip shop. An elderly man's home is burgled and expensive watches of great sentimental value are stolen but a neighbour's security camera catches the thief in the act.

1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: During a terrifying armed robbery in a jewellery shop the brave owners have a few tricks up their sleeves to confuse the thieves. Police in Dudley, West Midlands use a 'capture house' to snare burglars.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Police set up a covert operation to catch laptop computer thieves. Plus, terrifying footage of those who cheat death on railway level crossings - and how police catch them in the act.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Thieves break into a garage - but they are unaware that it is actually a trap set by the police. Elsewhere, a group of local residents trap and confront a vandal and are amazed to discover who it is.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: The owner of a bar fights back against bag snatchers and pickpockets. A trio of hapless teenagers attempt to burgle a house completely unaware that the police are watching their every move.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: In this edition of the show which looks at innovative ways of catching criminals, police officers tell the remarkable story of their operation to smash a drugs ring and catch the dealers in the act.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: A husband and wife team set up a cunning trap to catch an employee who is stealing from their sweet shop. High up on the roof of a church a metal thief does not realise that he is being watched.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: Callous thieves steal a mobility scooter not realising that their wicked actions have been captured on camera. Police fight back against illegal street racing which has left one innocent man with terrible injuries.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: West Midlands police deploy a decoy car and wait or thieves to break into it. A callous carer is caught on camera stealing from the lady that she is supposed to be looking after.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: A knife-wielding masked intruder terrifies shop staff - but police use vital visual clues to track him down. A 14-year-old-boy is beaten up on a bus but his attacker is filmed by on board cameras.

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: Police set up a decoy flat full of cameras to snare a gang of thieves who have been plaguing the local community. A man hides in a wardrobe to catch a carer who has been stealing money from under his bed.

1.title: Episode #2.1
1.plot: The fire service and police enlist the aid of CCTV to try to catch a hoax 999 caller who is putting lives at risk. An angry daughter plans to catch the callous carer stealing from her elderly parents.

1.title: Episode #3.1
1.plot: A doorstep crook cons his way into an elderly woman's home, distracting the owner so his fellow burglars can sneak in. A gang cruelly and illegally hunt deer for sport. With storms on the way neighbours steal sandbags.

1.title: Episode #4.1
1.plot: A family are horrified when hidden camera footage captures a woman creeping across the floor of the home of their disabled relative. There is a rat on the loose in a restaurant - but there is a twist to this tale.

11.title: Episode #5.11
11.plot: Dom looks at a jewellery heist that is more like a scene from a Hollywood film as locals try to stop the armed robbers. A supposed Good Samaritan deceives an elderly man in his own home.

12.title: Episode #5.12
12.plot: A family believe they are moving to a safer area when they leave inner-city London but an unwelcome visitor makes them think again. A thief is slowed down by a cat.

13.title: Episode #5.13
13.plot: A woman sets up a nerve-racking stakeout to try and catch a thief fleecing her elderly aunt. A couple suffer two burglaries in one night and their troubles don't end there.

14.title: Episode #5.14
14.plot: A teenager enjoying his first full-time job is shot at by an armed robber from point blank range, but bravely fights back. A rubbish dumper is caught in the act.

15.title: Episode #5.15
15.plot: A barman thinks he is in for a quiet night, then three armed robbers come into his club demanding to be taken to the safe. A local councillor loves his park bench but so does a thief.

16.title: Episode #5.16
16.plot: A shop manager is forced into fighting off a burglar. An organised team of criminals is on the rampage - attacking more than a hundred businesses to steal safes.

17.title: Episode #5.17
17.plot: A pregnant shop assistant is confronted by a gang of robbers in a supermarket. A mysterious figure haunts a centre for disabled adults in the middle of the night.

18.title: Episode #5.18
18.plot: When a teenager returns home in the wee small hours it is not her mother waiting at the door for her but a burglar. A shop owner comes up with a cunning plan to combat thieves.

19.title: Episode #5.19
19.plot: A sinister visitor in a school hall is up to no good. A late night intruder enters a Chinese restaurant. A mobile phone thief makes a schoolboy error that leads to his downfall.

20.title: Episode #5.20
20.plot: A brave woman who survived an Italian earthquake finds herself in even more danger on the streets of Manchester. Pedal-powered go-karts are stolen, can people power get them back?

1.title: Episode #6.1
1.plot: A former wrestler dusts off his grappling skills to tackle a robber fleeing a jewellers. A family home is burgled in the dead of night. A bold thief tries to trouser a snake in a pet shop.

2.title: Episode #6.2
2.plot: A carer steals from a former member of the royal household. A deli specialising in cheeses attracts a local rat. An armed robber who attacks a petrol station gets more than he bargained for.

3.title: Episode #6.3
3.plot: The owner of a hairdressing salon races to his shop hoping to catch thieves in the act. A man trying to steal from a radio station makes a schoolboy error.

4.title: Episode #6.4
4.plot: A bold intruder raids a social club safe while the manager is on the phone. A burglar meets his match. A man who breaks into a garage gets covered in engine oil.

5.title: Episode #6.5
5.plot: A clothes shop is raided on Halloween by men in grotesque masks. The new home of a WWII veteran becomes a crime scene. A thief bites off more than he can chew at a hardware store.

6.title: Episode #6.6
6.plot: Thieves pump gas into cash machines to explode them. A couple on holiday spot a burglar back home via their phone. A gang of men stealing cheese fall into a trap.

7.title: Episode #6.7
7.plot: A shopkeeper is stunned when a regular customer suddenly turns into an armed robber. A carer steals from a 100-year-old man. A pub landlord is furious when money raised for charity is stolen.

8.title: Episode #6.8
8.plot: A city unites to take on thieves targeting small businesses. A jeweller must act fast when armed men attack his shop. A couple use a baby buggy to steal a beer barrel.

9.title: Episode #6.9
9.plot: A thief raids a social club by sneaking in and waiting till everyone has gone home. A computer shop owner turns detective. Callous thieves steal from a farm that houses rescued animals.

10.title: Episode #6.10
10.plot: A post office comes under attack and the owner risks everything to defend it. A man tries to steal a phone from a pawnbroker. A couple's car is stolen while they are at the bedside of their ill daughter.

11.title: Episode #6.11
11.plot: A violent robber makes a mistake when he returns to the scene of his crime. Two wedding venue sculptures seem destined for a permanent honeymoon.

12.title: Episode #6.12
12.plot: A couple who own a sports club are shocked when they discover that a family friend has been stealing from them. A thief steals some expensive antique lamps.

13.title: Episode #6.13
13.plot: A pair of burglars bicker whilst carrying out a ram raid. A cheeky thief helps himself to two hanging baskets, but his trousers fall down.

14.title: Episode #6.14
14.plot: Three over excited burglars jump around like little kids when they see an unguarded safe. A robber gets a shock when a friendly shopkeeper turns out to be a martial arts expert.

15.title: Episode #6.15
15.plot: A burglar becomes the poster-boy for a police force's catch-a-thief campaign. A man struggles to steal a painting that is bigger than he is.

16.title: Episode #6.16
16.plot: An incompetent thief is hit by a large pane of glass. Police use state-of-the-art video analysis technology to discover the identity of an armed robber.

17.title: Episode #6.17
17.plot: At a jewellery shop, a man wearing a comical wig suddenly turns deadly serious. A hard-hearted thief is trapped after raiding children's bedrooms.

18.title: Episode #6.18
18.plot: Two men found around the back of a pub try to bluff their way out of trouble. A cycle thief spots an unattended bike but isn't given an easy ride.

19.title: Episode #6.19
19.plot: A burglar uses his backside to break into a hair salon. Two heartless thieves steal money that has been raised to help a seriously ill teenager.

20.title: Episode #6.20
20.plot: A blind man uses an electronic eye to see what his own eyes cannot. A clumsy crook trying to cut it as a burglar ends up cutting his own hand.

imdb.title: Caught Red Handed
plot: Documentary series in which 'Dominic Littlewood' (qv) looks at clever new ways in which police forces across the UK and members of the public are catching crooks red handed.::Mark_a_Wood <markawood@hotmail.co.uk>
